column1: prompt
Find a suitable dress for a summer event. The person who needs the dress is a size 12.
Develop a VR game centered around a post-apocalypse setting.
Create a style guide for a blog post on fashion.
Construct a linear regression model to predict sales. The dataset contains data on product prices and customer demographics.
Classify different dog breeds using a convolutional neural network.
Given an input sentence, insert a pronoun that directs the sentence towards the user. I wake up early every morning.
Given a sentence, modify it to remove any vulgar words. That is a r**diculous price for a car.
Compress this sentence as much as possible without changing its meaning. Although this method is not the fastest, it is certainly the most effective.
Rewrite this sentence to start with an adverb. She walked to the store yesterday.
Given an input sentence, add an antonym for the phrase. He is being very quiet.
Given a user query, generate a mock dialog. What events should I attend this weekend?

Identify the mistakes (if any) in the library management system design below. The Library Management System should store the number of books available in the library and the activities occurring in the library. Additionally it should also store the details of the users who take the books.

Explain why these two stories have a different tone. Story 1: An enterprising young man made it big in the business world.

Story 2: An ambitious youngster rose to the top of the corporate ladder.
In the following passage, point out the rhetorical devices used. "Money is the root of all evil"
Create a list of five external resources that can provide additional information on the given topic The history of the American Civil War
Given a factorial number, write the equation. 4!
A sentence contains a mistake. Identify the mistake. She has been studying hard since yesterday afternoon.
List all the possible interpretations of the following sentence. I saw him leave
In the following passage, identify the alliteration used. A daring deer dashed down the dirt driveway.
During a meeting, your colleague has said something incorrect. Reword the sentence in a polite way to avoid an awkward situation. "It's easy to make mistakes, so please don't feel embarrassed."
Create a menu for a healthy lunch
Identify the type of the following text: "We will be hosting a virtual event on Wednesday."
Generate a recipe for black bean tacos
Are the following two equations equivalent: 2x + 3y = 7 and 3y + 2x = 7
You need to find an article that critiques a given technology. 3D-printing
Can you name some popular shows airing this season?
Suggest an interesting place a tourist should visit in France.
Complete the following sentence using the given words. The output should use all the words in the given order. sentence petite vacation exotic
Rewrite the given sentence, making it more concise while retaining the same meaning. In terms of food and beverage, the flight was exactly the same as any other flight I've ever taken.

Detect the sentiment of the given sentence. Score the sentiment on a scale of 0 - 4, where 0 is 'Negative', 1 is 'Slightly Negative', 2 is 'Neutral', 3 is 'Slightly Positive', 4 is 'Positive'. The view from the hotel room was breathtaking.
List three potential sources for the following research problem. What are the benefits of online learning?
Find the sentence or sentences that refute or disprove a given statement. The Amazon rainforest is the world's largest rainforest and is home to a wealth of biodiversity.
Clean up the sentence by removing unnecessary words and sentence fragments. I've been planning it for weeks now, and it is going to be a very fun event.
Compare and contrast two different types of facial recognition technologies.
Create a tagline that summarizes the idea of the product or service presented in the sentence. Our company offers customized software solutions for businesses that need help managing their data.
Explain how voice search technology works.
Rewrite the sentence to express one idea. Electric cars are more cost effective than gasoline cars and have the added benefit of being better for the environment.
Create 8 keywords to describe the given product. A personal assistant that schedules meetings, sends emails and tracks tasks
List the four most important components for designing a successful website.
Write an introductory paragraph for a research paper on the potential effects of artificial intelligence.

Identify the scientific names for the given plants Dandelion:
Chrysanthemum:
Generate a comparison between 3G and 5G
Name the basic geometric shapes
Write a code to calculate the average of three integers.
Create a positive customer support response. Customer: What time does the store close?
Develop a classification algorithm to identify the type of plant from its description. The plant has broad green leaves with white flowers.
Find a common phrase for "I don't understand"?
Find a synonym for the phrase "scared witless".
How would you use this photo in a marketing campaign? <image included in email>
Analyze the given text and find out what is the author's opinion/stance. The electrification of transportation is essential for reducing carbon emissions and fighting climate change.
Suggest two initiatives for stimulating the economy.
Rate this product from 1 to 5 in terms of quality and value. <description of a product>
As a financial planner, provide tips for saving money for retirement.
Analyze the given text and determine the primary argument being made. Water is vital to human health and access to it is a human right.

From the following list, select three keywords for the given text. Possible keywords include: Water, Disease, Climate, Policy, Pollution, Restrictions, Diseases caused by water pollution have worsened in many countries due to extreme climate conditions and the lack of effective policies.
You are given a data set and asked to create a visualization that would highlight the main trends in the data. <data set included in email>
You are given a sequence of numbers. Determine if the sequence is arithmetic or geometric. 2, 4, 8, 16
You are tasked with coming up with a plan for reducing energy consumption in a city.
The given text is written in passive voice. Rewrite the sentence in active voice. The company policy was changed by the manager.
Write a short story (less than 100 words) based on the following prompt. Prompt: It was a night like any other, until a mysterious stranger walked up to them at the bar.
Generate an essay of 500 words on the topic of machine learning.
Describe a scenario in which the GPT model was used to improve customer experience
Provide an example of using GPT for task automation
Explain what an AI-driven chatbot is
Write a persuasive essay on why small businesses should use AI
Identify the primary data structure used for a machine learning algorithm
Is the number 3 factors of 8?
Write the following sentence in present tense. I had been walking for an hour.
Find out how many species of birds there are in the world.

Suggest two content changes to the paragraph that would improve its readability and make it more interactive. This is a website dedicated to exploring the diversity of global cultures, from the culture of ancient civilizations to the culture of the modern world. The website contains a wealth of information, including photos, videos, and audio samples.
Add two sentences to this text to help establish a clear sequence of events. John had been sick for a few days. He decided to go see a doctor.
Construct a traceability plan.
Paraphrase the sentence to remove the cliche. Time waits for no one.
Classify the emotion conveyed in the following sentence as happy, sad, or neutral. I had a lovely day.
List three food sources of Omega-3 fatty acids.
Write a hypothesis why there is a relationship between air pollution and asthma.
Make a 3-4 sentence summary about the given article. The article is about the effects of climate change on marine life.
Calculate the total number of pages in the book. There are 350 pages in the book.
Generate a short fiction story about a family of three.

Describe the author's argument in the following essay. In his essay, the author argues that the current educational system fails to foster effective learning and collaboration. He cites the lack of emphasis on student engagement and failure to inspire creativity as primary causes of this failure.
Determine whether the following text contains inappropriate language. The project manager was really frustrated with the amount of work he had to do.
Create a rhymning couplet about fear.

Analyze the narrative structure of the following story. Once upon a time, there were two friends - John and Bill - who lived in a small town. One day, they decided to travel together to a nearby city. On the way, they faced many obstacles and eventually reached their destination.

San Jose   |    75 F   |     0.2 inch
Vancouver  |    43 F   |     0.8 inch
New York   |    66 F   |     0.3 inch
Guess the title of the phrase Down by the river
Create a word cloud based on the given set of words home, school, work, family
Generate a story of 3 to 5 sentences that uses a metaphor to describe the relationship between two people
Tell me a preschool age-appropriate poem with a winter theme
Explain how increasing the habit of reading can improve a person's life
Think of a clever way to ask a person out on a date
Describe a situation in which someone has to take a difficult decision
Make a list of 10 Indian home remedies for burns
Edit this sentence to improve its grammar and make it more concise: "The cat was so quiet that nobody noticed it was there."
